otherNames: Lovely Muuuuuuuco!, いとしのムーコ
synopsis:
The seventh compiled volume of Takayuki Mizushina's Itoshi no Muco manga is announcing on Thursday that a television anime adaptation has been green-lit for this fall.

The manga depicts the life of the pet dog Muco and his owner Komatsu, who lives in his glass-making workshop in the mountains.
